Name: Nokori
About the game: Nokori Raise a hero then go explore with said hero. The game revolves around the hero performing various activities, such as strength training, attending the school of magic, taking art lessons, practicing an instrument, etc. Each day you are allowed to perform three main actions by clicking on the icons. If you overwork and fail to rest...
